subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Joba Chamberlain gave up the tying homer to Nelson Cruz in the eighth, Chad Gaudin gave up the game-winning homer to Cruz on his first pitch of the 13th.
snippet: After Joba Chamberlain gave up the tying homer to Nelson Cruz in the eighth, Chad Gaudin gave up the game-winning homer to Cruz on his first pitch of the 13th.
